title: Flash precipitation of random copolymers in a micro-mixer for controlling the size and surface charge of nanoparticles
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,19147-19153
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01433B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jeong-Un Joo, Chae-Hyeon Park, Jianwen Yang, Yoonseok Ko, Sang Soo Jee, Hyungju Ahn, Dong-Pyo Kim
The flash nanoprecipitation (FNP) method enables the synthesis of size and surface charge-controllable nanoparticles from random copolymers under three flow regimes.
